info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and east central Lawrence Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deadwood, or 4 miles northeast of Lead, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Apple Springs around 205 PM MDT. Sturgis around 210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 26 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
